ApplicationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1284  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9-\.]{1,63}:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[^/].{0,1023}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{35}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048

Update requires: Replacement
